name: Fairy Godmari
description:
In this Love Live! Sunshine!! fan VN/shitpost, Mari gains magic powers. But of course, her spells don't always come without consequences.

The spiritual successor to Honk Loves Maki, featuring:

  • Poorly photoshopped sprites!
  • At least three cultural references!
  • Dia cussing!
  • ABBA songs!
  • Three possible endings — that's 50% more for the same low, low price of $0.00!

The game runs at 1080p. To enter fullscreen mode, just press F. (This is, surprisingly, not a joke.)
